doc.field: 1. "Guide Map of Isfahan," Ministry of Islamic Guidance General Office of Islamic Guidance of Esfahan Office of Tourism--Sahab Geographic & Drafting Institute, 1985. 2. "Guide Map of Isfahan," Ministry of Information and Tourism--The ECHO of Iran, 1974, 2 copies. 3. "Iran Highway Map," Ministry of Roads Planing and Programming Division, 1973. 4. "Iran Highway Map," Ministry of Roads Planing and Programming Division, 1970. 5. "Carte Touristique de Teheran," Iran National Tourist Organization--The ECHO of Iran, date unknown, 3 copies. 6. "La carte touristique de la Républiqe Islamique de l'Iran," Ministère de l'Orientation Islamique, date unknown. 7. "Road Map of Iran [with maps of Shiraz, Isfahan, Persepolis, and Tehran]," publisher unknown, date unknown. 8. "Stadt-Führer Von Tehran," Iran National Tourist Organization--The ECHO of Iran, date unknown.
